import React from'react';import{Link,useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import'../styles/Navbar.css';// If using Font Awesome
import{FaRecycle,FaRedditSquare}from'react-icons/fa';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Navbar=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();/**
   * Logs the current user out by removing the stored authentication token,
